Call Utilities API bot to get BulkId to update paymentNumber in Merged Output file

Call Utilities API bot
The bot will:
- Check if all invoices inserted and return a flag indicating success/fail
- If all inserted, 
          - get payment number to use as invoice number in Oracle
          - update merged file (insertIntoElectricityWaterSystem column) with invoice status (1)
          - update merged file (paymentNumber column)
- If only some inserted, check with Business user what is the action to be taken (out of 10 invoices, only first 6 inserted)
          - Check if API will return a payment number
          - update merged file (insertIntoElectricityWaterSystem column) with invoice status (0/1)
          - Ask business user if we should add invoices inserted successfully into E&W system to Oracle or API needs to delete invoices inserted
